page.description: Draw the border of a rectangle.
page.syntax: V RECT(N XPos,N YPos,N Width,N Height)

argument.name: XPos
argument.description: The horizontal coordinate of the upper left corner of the shape. Larger values move right.

argument.name: YPos
argument.description: The vertical coordinate of the upper left corner of the shape. Larger values move down.

page.discussion: The RECT() function draws a rectangle on the bitmap. There is no fill. The border is the current pen color. Compare to the INNER_RECT()and FILL_RECT()functions.

section.example: ui_bitmap_create("test", 4, 2) ui_bitmap_draw("test",<<%code% inner_Rect(0, 0, 4, 2) set_brush("green") set_pen("black") rect(1, .5, 2, 1) %code%) ui_dlg_box("","{image=test}")

page.limitations: This function is only used in the Code sections of UI_BITMAP_DRAW(), UI_SCREEN_DRAW(), and UI_PRINTER_DRAW().
